description: Provision of part additional storey to existing warehouse building with associated first floor side extension
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s) 18086-LP000 - Location Plan, 18086-GA000 - Existing Site Plan, 18086-GA001 - Existing Ground Floor Plan, 18086-GA002 - Existing First Floor Plan, 18086-GA003 - Existing Roof Plan, 18086-GA010 - Existing Section AA, 18086-GA015 - Existing Front Elevation, 18086-GA016 - Existing Rear Elevation, 18086-GA017 - Existing East Elevation, 18086-GA018 - Existing West Elevation, 18086-GA100 - Proposed Site Plan, 18086-GA101 - Proposed Ground Floor Plan, 18086-GA102 - Proposed First Floor Plan, 18086-GA103 - Proposed Roof Plan, 18086-GA110 - Proposed Section AA, 18086-GA115 - Proposed Front Elevation, 18086-GA116 - Proposed Rear Elevation, 18086-GA117 - Proposed East Elevation, 18086-GA118 - Proposed West Elevation, 18086/DAS prepared by Architecture for London (undated)

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2016) and Policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), polices 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012).
